website_summaries.verdict: Roomy, durable, and practical lunch box for convenient packing of generous amount of food and beverages.
pros: Popular lunch box made of durable, soil-resistant material and eco-conscious PEVA liner
2-way zipper opening and enough room for lunch for 2, including a couple 12-ounce cans or tall bottles
Side bungee compartment to hold utensils or other accessories
Sturdy, adjustable shoulder strap and side handles to grab and go
cons: Not leak-proof, as some buyers have had messes from spilled beverages
Works better to keep things cool if an ice pack is added

customer_reviews.title: Good design, bad quality, Can't return.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this not too long ago. The design of the bag is actually what I wanted. Plenty of room, and compact. I like the exterior bottle holders. The thing that bothers me is the fact that I noticed the stitching on the top flap zipper is coming undone, I've only used it about a week. I tried returning it or replaced but "item is not eligible for return". I wish item would've made it defective free to me to see how long this lasts. I hope it's a fluke and I got a bad batch because this bag has potential. Pictures included, bananas for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Macias

customer_reviews.title: It is a great size-I can fit my 32 oz water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and have been using it for a few weeks. It is a great size-I can fit my 32 oz water bottle, my large soda stream bottle, and still have plenty of room for snacks and food. It just fits in my fridge. Make sure to pay attention to the measurements-it is a larger sized lunch box. Great purchase & would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small, just right!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. Large enough to use for a road trip, but small enough to use for taking lunch to work. Using this + Nordic ice ice packs kept things cold all day in a hot car (90 degree outside temperature, sunny).
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Huge, durable bag!
customer_reviews.text: Two food thermoses of pasta, a food jar for chips, two sub sandwiches, two bottles of water, a Gatorade, and two croissant breakfast sandwiches. This, on average, is what my trucker husband takes to work. This awesome lunch bag sees him through rough and tumble 60 hour weeks - there is a loop inside for me to stash silverware for him, and the pocket up front is great for him to keep gum and his work phone. He also loves the over-the shoulder strap. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect height for two (or three) 24 oz Contigo stainless thermos, some ice and room to spare. It now goes to the beach or the golf course with us and I don't need to carry a purse for my phone/wallet/keys since the pockets hold these nicely. It's well insulated, keeps my drinks icy cold for hours and seems very well made. Great item!!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, haven't put it to the use...Construction is solid. Tall. Can fit a water bottle inside which is why we love this. Only wish it comes with handles up at the top but otherwise solid lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: EYCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water from ice melt.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lunchbox for work and to use as drink cooler on the weekends. The dimensions are great and I can easily fit two meals inside for long work days where I need to bring both lunch and dinner. However when I used this as a drink cooler, I filled it with drinks and ice, and once the ice started to melt the bag leaked regularly. Maybe this should have been intuitive, but with advertisements as an optional drink cooler I assumed it would hold ice well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelm

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to pack lunch and it is excellent. It is worth mentioning that this is on the larger side for a lunch box - we put a 6 pack of bottles (unpacked), a few juice bags and some snacks in it for a 4th of July outing, all stayed cold and fit well. The materials and zippers are of good quality and it feels very sturdy. We plan on purchasing another for vacation in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: You’ll never want another lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag. This is my second one, first bag was a gift from my work all employees received a bag 6 yrs ago. Many people have reordered the bag. It’s well insulated and can hold many items for a long work day. The outer pocket is good for pens, earplugs and ID’s. The side straps holds water bottles, insulated cup or umbrella. A good item for work, school or trips.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E Stein

customer_reviews.title: Not Great just adaquate
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but feels kind of flimsy. Biggest issue I have is the shoulder strap, it's about as basic a strap you can get and just slips off your shoulder. Putting the strap across your body isn't a good idea because once again, basic no padding and it will just dig into your neck. Consider this bag for it's size not it's build quality or function and be aware even the zippers are really low end. If I had to do it over again I would purchase something else
customer_reviews.author: OldthorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my teenage son!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been trying to eat healthy lately. I'm able to prepare him salads for school, toss in an ice pack and his food is still very cold cold lunch time. There's also plenty of space for a teenage appetite! Would definitely recommend to anyone that needs roomy space and insulated storage to keep things cold!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend because his old lunch box was falling apart. This thing is HUGE inside. It carries well and has lots of pockets and side drink holders. You need to have an adequate cooling source inside of it. The cooling pack was missing in this one when we got it, but we had a better one at home already. Excellent price!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Posie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for train commuters
customer_reviews.text: I so love this cooler. Because of a kidney issue I am on a specific regimen and I'm able to fit 4 of my tall MAPS 24 oz water bottles in here as well as 2 disposable water bottles and all stand up with no spills. This works above and beyond what I was hoping for. I'll buy a second when I can.
customer_reviews.author: JBD

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Should have bought two.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size especially if you carry a lot of snacks. Think of it as your mom’s hand bag - she had everything and then some because you never know. The exterior pocket i use and sometimes forget about because all my items fit inside well. I do not use the exterior bottle holder. I find I can do without it. As you sintch the string it also minimizes the interior capacity. My advise. If you use the exterior bottle holder, add it last after packing the inside of the bag. Easy to clean. With regular soap and water- wiping up anything sticky is a breeze. I should have bought two. My wife hijacks it whenever she can.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, roomy, and does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, plenty of room for prepackaged salad, Sandwich, fruit and 20oz drink. Holds the cold easily from 7am to around 2pm with just one small icepack
customer_reviews.author: Auswak (Prime Since 2006)

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, only had it a day or two
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only had it a day or two, but I love the size and the look. It looks durable and the zipper seems good thus far. Try rubbing a candle across it if it gets stuck often.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morsy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to hold a 12" bottle, thermos, etc - Ample room for lunch items and drinks, added bonus not seen when ordering is the two elastic holders for your tall bottles/thermos inside. Roomy pocket on the front and the two side holders outside provides carrying of all needed itmes. Really fits all the needs purchased for! Definately recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for meals, water bottles and snacks. Keeps stored items cool. Large enough to meet storage needs, small enough to comfortably carry. I like the small zippered storage compartment in the front for easy access to personal items. Wish seller offered more colors. Read other reviews about the zipper getting stuck so I rubbed a little candle wax along the zipper "teeth" before my first use. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch tote
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a LOT of different totes and even bought two others I hated; but this one is the perfect size for me and is well made. I like the side pockets as well-they are perfect for cans or bottles.
customer_reviews.author: James Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunchbox. It is big enough to easily pack lots of stuff into it, but also is smaller and less clunky than a lot of coolers. I love the over the shoulder strap and places to store bottles or bags on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: CEM

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people that take more than just a lunch, has a big zipper pocket for utensils, earbuds or any other items. Sides hold water bottles or bottled drinks, also can hold other things. The bag is very roomy, holds allot and keeps things cold for along time. Easy to carry strap or handle option. Looks just as picture and comes as described. Very pleased! Received quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: This is designed like a deep narrow bucket, very awkward and hard tomopen and close. I never used it because of this reason. Tried to return it the next day but this item is not eligible for return! Nowhere is that written in the description.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet roomy
customer_reviews.text: It fits my needs perfectly. I needed something that would fit all day food for work. Lunch and snacks with a beverage or two but not take up a lot of room. This fit me well. I can fit my tall beverage holder, my lunch and snacks for the day and still have room to put in a couple of ice bags. Stays cold the whole time I am at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits under a seat!
customer_reviews.text: Good size. NOT too large. Perfect for an adult lunch and snacks. We go a couple of times a year to a convention that is most of the day, so we need a bag that will hold each Individuals Lunch, beverage, Water bottle, Snacks And yet still fit under our seat. Its Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amlemmon

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: After using several different lunch bags, some purchased online & some purchased in stores, this by far is the best one I've come across. It is very durable & well made. It holds it's shape & seems to be very good quality. For the price, it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent O. Vescovi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is great. I've seen reviews claiming it falls apart quickly but so far (about 4 weeks daily rough use) I've had no issues with durability. It holds more than I need for lunch as well as a magazine or book to read during downtime.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality. A little bigger than i planned, but nice and durable. Keeps it all cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cam82NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shape and Size
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I can take my water without fear of spilling. It fits my lunch, ice and all that I need to get through the work-day without having to purchase anything. The expandable bands on the side are only good for decoration. I tried using them to hold my water and it fell right through. Still, I couldn't find a lunchbox I like more!
customer_reviews.author: Trula

customer_reviews.text: Four stars because the backpack straps, something I will not use do not come off unless you cut them off which I did
customer_reviews.author: FuzzyDice

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks COLD!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack kept cans cold with a cooler pack even while walking Las Vegas in 105' weather. It is a little bulky and did not include a cooler pack but still saved us alot of money on cold drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Fickel

customer_reviews.title: Large bag but doesn’t look like a purse!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it! Fits half of the kitchen in his lunch bag! He likes the fact that it’s big but doesn’t look like a women’s purse!
customer_reviews.author: Kriskringle

customer_reviews.title: Unbalance lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: The lunchbox is large enough to put in the Hydro flask 32 ounce drink. Plenty of storage space. However the weight distribution is unstable . The back tips forward and doesn’t stand by itself. The top zipper does not glide freely.
customer_reviews.author: DRAGON

customer_reviews.title: Kick ass bag, the only problem is it sweats ...
customer_reviews.text: Kick ass bag, the only problem is it sweats through the fabric so put a plastic bag under it or in the truck bed. Beach day 85+ holds ice from the morning until leaving the beach at sunset.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Essential desert accessory
customer_reviews.text: If you live in the desert like I do, one of these is essential to get your gallon of milk home at the proper temperature. Holds a full gallon plus two ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: Pat-inCO

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I received this and it way to large. It will not fit in my son's shared locker at school. I tried to return it and can get no response in order to return it after several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: jodisky

customer_reviews.title: That it's not built like crap
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it for the price it's very well-built it keeps my stuff cool all day long I'm a welder and it stays in the hot box and my stuff is still cool 8 hours later plenty of room in it as well plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. It is large and I can pack enough food to last me all day. There are two straps inside to hold drinks in place as well. Keeps my food cold with a ice pack in there all day! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Migliaccio

customer_reviews.title: Fits allot and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I work construction and use this for work everyday. Two ice packs keep my bag cool for usually 10 to 12 hours. I usually carry two 32oz. Gatorade 4 bottles of water and my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Stevoh28

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The only we didn't like is it didn't come with a "sandwich rack", but otherwise he likes it! Well made, we appreciate the zippers instead of velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for a day at the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great for a day at the beach! Keeps drinks and food cool for hours even on a hot Florida day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMe

customer_reviews.title: It is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this bag everyday for 9months. It is still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Leca

customer_reviews.title: A Jethro size lunch bag that works very well
customer_reviews.text: It's a giant lunch bag, but if you want room to hold lunch and a variety of drinks like I do, you will love this. With a couple of Kleen Kanteens inside everything is still cold at lunch time. I think it looks nice also.
customer_reviews.author: whiterockron

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Will see how long it lasts. I needed something a little larger to replace my old worn out bag, and this has even more room than I need for just my daily work lunch. The extra storage space is just right for me as it will hold the things that I actually need, but won't let me bring too much extraneous crapola as I am wont to do.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: The first time using this bag it leaked water from the bottom of the bag all over the seat of my truck. I would not recommend using this bag with ice cubes. You'll end up with a wet seat unless you use the ice packs instead of ice cubes which don't keep cold for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Binnix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ! Very roomy but not HUGE.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for ! Lots of room. I usually take a large salad and a bottle of dressing everyday. Fit perfect with plenty of room for an Ice pak, yogurt, even a 16oz bottle of water. Nice buy
customer_reviews.author: Steve TwentyOne

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used because this was too big for my hubby. He didn’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  A Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could just leave a 5-Star review without writing a novel to go along with it. I like it. It's good. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: LJRossPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack, plenty of room in main area. Needs a couple of smaller pockets. Kept my lunch and drinks cold. I would love to have kept it, but I drive a truck and need the extra pockets. That's why only 4stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great for Men
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunch bag its pretty spacious. My husband takes lunch to work every day and it fits all his food comfortably. Fits 4 drinks and keeps food cool specially in Texas Heat.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is it's a little larger than my needs, but otherwise it's a great product. The insulation works well short term (haven't had the need for long term) & the loops inside & storage compartments are really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: britt foster

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband for work and 2 months later and no complaints. He packs multiple waters and his dinner. Stays cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Best one on the market
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality. It keeps 'Everything" cold for hours. Very large interior. I like that I can pack my lunch haphazardly because the inside is big enough to hold random size containers and big water bottles. On those hectic mornings I'll just grab things right out the fridge and toss em' in and I still have room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I use this to bring my lunch to work everyday. I put in a frozen gel pack in the morning and it is still mostly frozen by lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for my fiancé and he’s very pleased with it . Perfect height for him to just put his coffee mugs inside the bag. Don’t know if it’s leakproof but overall GREAT BUY THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Moonbeams

customer_reviews.title: Great Value even greater capacity
customer_reviews.text: Great value, carries several bottles of wine, perfect for lunch and the some, did I mention it carries several bottles of wine?
customer_reviews.author: Victor Olivarez

customer_reviews.title: It looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, but that's not a problem. My son has used it several times and the bag accommodated everything with room to spare. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More lunchbag
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is the best i ever had. Lots of room to store a lot of items. I love the compartment to put my water bottle in. Seems to be very durable. I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: JillsMan58

customer_reviews.title: Good large lunch bag option
customer_reviews.text: Good large lunch bag option. Does have a smell at first and wish the side straps/bottle holders were a little easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: couldn't return it
customer_reviews.text: The bag was larger than I thought. I tried to return it as my local UPS store, one mile from my home, and they told me I had to take it to a Kohls Department store, 22 miles from my home. Impossible for me to get there. Never mentioned that when I purchased it. A very unhappy customer, Anna D.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Distelzweig

customer_reviews.title: Like the tall height, saves on footprint!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big without taking up a whole shelf in the community fridge at work! Plenty of space for enough food for a 12 hour shift or a 12 hour day at school.
customer_reviews.author: PLJPAR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch bag. The bunji cord pockets are a lot more useful than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: whitedove

customer_reviews.title: Huge lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: This is a HUGE lunch bag! Holds a full size power aid with 3 inches left above. Could hold 3 lunches.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Country

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch bag, however, watch the size. It is pretty big and not all the wide. I do meal prep and this isn't wide enough to fit a small container. Pretty tall, but not to wide.
customer_reviews.author: David Rain

customer_reviews.title: Really cold
customer_reviews.text: Kept everything really cold. I used it on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Marjoanie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like. You can't put ice in it, it will leak from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Melcher

customer_reviews.title: Large lunch bag, great for picnics or large meals!
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag is HUGE and I love it. It has plenty of room for all of the juice I send with my son daily to school.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to carry and always has plenty of room. It's perfect for my softball daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: Bag had a weird chemical smell. Did not get better with use. I wondered if it was used, as it had an odd spot on it, and had been cleaned with a harsh chemical. Great space and tall. Should have returned but smell was too much. Just threw away!
customer_reviews.author: koramchase

customer_reviews.title: Love this lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box. It is big and fits a lot of stuff in it. Very durable and keeps food and drink cold when I put my ice pack in it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harris

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this lunch box before that
customer_reviews.text: I only used it 4 times then the zipper pull came off because the end of the zipper came unsewn. I really liked this lunch box before that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect size fore me holds my lunch and 4 sodas ...
customer_reviews.text: it is the perfect size fore me holds my lunch and 4 sodas and ice pack plus it has front pocket to put my chips in
customer_reviews.author: philwalker76

customer_reviews.title: BEST lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lunch box. It's huge so it's able to fit my breakfast, my snacks, and my lunch! It's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to store food dorn12 hour shift workers. Looks sleek and is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize this thing was so huge in pics. ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this thing was so huge in pics. Purchased to fit in backpack for daily use. Too wide for us. Very well put together, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far - plenty of space for multiple containers and can fit 2 bottles on the outside - happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dan LaMorte

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a lunchbox. Wish it would had a hard tub insert for bottom half.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dickson

customer_reviews.title: better for a picnic and not a lunchbox for work ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to big I did not take the time to really look at how big this thing is, better for a picnic and not a lunchbox for work or school.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Mazzola

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch mate
customer_reviews.text: awesome lunch bag at an affordable price and plenty of storage. You cannot go wrong with this bag. The side storage i use to carry water bottles or even sunscreen for trips to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. Its sturdy and fits many containers.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: A beast of a lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast but that's what I needed. Very large, prefect for fitting meals, snacks, and several water bottles which was my main need. Very well made, large, and a simple design.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Munoz

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this around eight months ago and the stictching around the lower portion is already coming undone. Poor manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Verez

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a suitcase for lunch it's great, but it won't fit in most work refrigerators and when I tried to return it, it says this item cannot be returned. It didn't mention that when I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: sarah f

customer_reviews.title: It leaks really badly. I’ve tried ice in ziplock ...
customer_reviews.text: It leaks really badly. I’ve tried ice in ziplock, ice in a solid container, and in a heavy plastic bag and it still leaks. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Judybear

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Lightweight, keeps food and drinks cold. .took to Disney with drinks and snacks..also take to work..works great!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Like the side pockets. Holding up well from being thrown in the truck day after day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This item is not leakproof. Stitching is garbage and condensation ends up on bottom of lunch box. My bag came with interior insulation not even attached and I cant return because it is not allowed. DO NOT BUY, RIPOFF!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very usefull. I take my meals to my office avery day
customer_reviews.author: AMoro

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my food but insulation coul be better
customer_reviews.text: You really need a lot of ice packs to keep everything cool.. does fit large water and wine bottles and plastic containers
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: This lunch bag was exactly what we were looking for and love the size. However, there are 2 zippers and one of them literally cracked off within a week of using the bag. This is disappointing and we looked to contact the company but there was no way to do so through Amazon. Maybe it's a defect. Hoping the second zipper holds strong...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely large... I am enjoying using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely large...I am enjoying using it to carry my soda in to college.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: So roomy ! I can fit tons of stuff in here for my husband's lunch! Very satisfied !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice big bag
customer_reviews.text: It leaks something fierce. It is a nice big bag,seems well made except for the leaking part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend to put his lunch and drinks in! He loves it, very spacious and keeps the cool and heat in
customer_reviews.author: jasmine & shane

customer_reviews.title: good cooler
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a cooler for our vacation, this cooler worked out well. It is a little bulky in tight spaces but was comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I only rated 4 stars because I haven't been able to put it to use yet, we bought this for an upcoming Disney trip. The size is perfect, its lightweight, straps could be a tad more comfortable on the shoulders, but overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa M LaScala

customer_reviews.title: Great biy
customer_reviews.text: Nice lunch bag I bought for my husband. He actually uses it and now my son took it from him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lunch bag I’ve ever had lots of room and it keeps my food cold all day. I finally found the perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Meir lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bag. It’s very durable and holds a lot
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size with lots of room. Well-constructed. I would buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Khallis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control, defective product, can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper tab was sewn into the top cover seam. So I had to cut the thread to release the zipper. Now the top cover is coming apart. I haven’t even used this once, it’s falling apart and the seller has a no return policy, even though it’s basically defective. Waste of $14. Should have bought the Coleman cooler I looked at originally. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Smolinski

product_meta.title: MIER Leakproof Cooler Backpack Insulated Lunch Bag for Men Women to Picnic, Beach, Grocery, Kayak, Hiking, Travel, 30Can, Black Blue
feature_bullets: Backpack Style Leakproof Cooler ---- The interior liner is constructed with 8mm thick thermal wall with heat welded leakproof PEVA liner built to keep the cold in and the hot out, without worrying about leaking, dripping or any watery spills or mess; Easy to clean

30 Can Large Insulated Bag ---- The overall dimension is 10.6" L x 7.8" W x 16.9" H; interior size is 10.2" L x 7" W x 14.9" H; Holding 30-32 cans of 355ml cola at least and still have much room for ice packs. The thick insulation can keep the food cold/hot/fresh for hours

Organized Pockets ---- Designed with a spacious 2-way zipper cooler compartment with 1 inner mesh pouch, 2 side elastic mesh pockets with bungee cords for holding water bottle, towel or clothes, and can be tightened securely; 1 roomy front zipper pocket; 1 small front pocket with hook and loop closure

Three Carrying Options ---- Featuring dual adjustable padded backpack straps, 1 detachable/adjustable padded shoulder strap, so it can be strapped on like a backpack or casually carried like a shoulder cooler, crossbody cooler; 2 side haul handles; Plus 1 sternum strap and 1 hip belt help to lock your backpack in place securely and distribute the load

Limited Manufacturer's Warranty ---- TWO-YEAR for MIER cooler backpack and lifetime customer service. We stand behind our products. If a product fails because of a defect in material or the quality of workmanship, we will replace it free of charge. MIER takes pride in the quality of our products and warrants that the materials and workmanship will be free of any defects. Our factories follow a strict set of specifications and quality standards, however, if a problem develops, please contact us
